column4: BRIEF-Adobe  Microsoft expand partnership on e-commerce signatures
column5: * Adobe and Microsoft expand strategic partnership to drive e-signatures and collaboration among teams in the cloud

column4: Ford's Lincoln brand plans electrified versions of all models by 2022 -sources
column5: DETROIT  Sept 7 Ford Motor Co's premium Lincoln brand plans to offer hybrid gasoline-electric versions of all its U.S. models by 2022  according to three sources familiar with the plans.

column4: The death of the car show?
column5: PARIS/FRANKFURT Frankfurt's vast auto show  which opens next week  is already getting attention of the wrong kind - for its impressive list of no-shows.

column4: All new Jaguar Land Rover cars to have electric option from 2020
column5: LONDON  Sept 7 All new Jaguar Land Rover cars will be available in an electric or hybrid version from 2020  Britain's biggest carmaker said on Thursday  as it speeds up plans to electrify its model range.

column4: BRIEF-Avitas Systems  a GE Venture  partners with Nvidia to enhance AI for robotic inspection and automated defect recognition
column5: * Avitas Systems GE Venture- Partnering with Nvidia to use some advances in artificial intelligence computing to optimize use of robotics Source text: [http://bit.ly/2wLeh9O] Further company coverage:

column4: Intel to update 5G testing device to meet standards
column5: NEW YORK  Sept 7 Chipmaker Intel Corp said on Thursday that it was updating 5G equipment that will allow telecom companies like AT&T Inc and Verizon Communications Inc to run trials based on standards to be released later this year.
